This movie is essentially Desperado/El Mariachi with some semi-attractive nude women. But mostly, even the women aren't that much to look at.

The movie is horrible, with bad acting. And the audio is out of sync with the video for half of the movie, getting errors of upwards of 1 second towards the end. Pretty atrocious.

Don't bother downloading this rubbish.

And by the way, anyone watching the "deaths" closely will notice that people are moving when they are supposed to be dead.

One of the priests blinks his eyes and looks at the camera. One of the nuns moves her tongue after she's strangled.

That should tell you something.
